title: Influence of halogen–halogen interactions in the self-assembly of pillar[5]arene-based supramolecular polymers
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20553-20560
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03769C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mickey Vinodh, Anwar A. Alshammari, Talal F. Al-Azemi
We report the impact of 1,4-dihalobutanes in the self-assembly of supramolecular polymer based on pillar[5]arene driven by guest halogen–halogen interactions in solution, in addition their disassembly promoted by N-containing compound.
